Subject: db.action.remove
Value: [reason why the record should be removed]
Does: running db.action removes the flagged records in antechronological order, also removing the record listing the action as it goes

Subject: db.action.approve
Field: [the record ID for which verification is given]
Value: [reason why the record has been approved]

Subject: db.action.doubt
Field: [the ID of the record that is flagged as doubtful]

Subject: db.action.translate
Does: running db.action translates the terms across the whole registry in chronological order, also removing the record listing the action as it goes
